attributes.action: Close USAF bases in United kingdom and dismiss US military assest on our island.
attributes.additional_details: Usa hasn't ruled out military action in Greenland and is becoming an even more aggressive country. We must show a sign of strength. Prepare for war to ensure peace.
attributes.background: Dismiss the 11 significant usaf military bases housed at raf bases. Dismiss large amounts of us military assets. Usa is threatening our allies (Denmark) we cannot sit by and allow their aggressive actions threaten the peace of europe.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/717971
